history.proof: intros d. destruct d as [p a]. unfold dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, dta_kill_non_coacc. unfold predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, predta_kill_non_coacc. hauto use: lazy_power_eg_power, equal_eqm_bool, eqm_bool_equal unfold: predta_coacc_states_0, predta_coacc_states, preDTA inv: DTA.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad Unable to unify "dta (non_coacc_kill p (predta_coacc_states p a)) a" with "dta (non_coacc_kill p (predta_coacc_states_0 p a)) a".

original: intros d. destruct d as [p a]. unfold dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, dta_kill_non_coacc. simpl. unfold predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, predta_kill_non_coacc. reflexivity.
